programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: An ER doctor's friend arrives at the hospital combative and out of control; a cyclist's throat is torn open when a driver opens a car door in her path; a nursing student is found passed out on the hospital floor.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life

programme.desc: Jazz turns 18 and starts making plans to move out of the house, much to Greg and Jeanette's dismay. Jazz also launches her own kids' day camp but worries her very first event will fail. The family plans a surprise outing to celebrate Jazz's birthday.

programme.title: Lottery Changed My Life
programme.desc: Discover the joys and heartbreak of lottery winners around the U.S. Including a group of street-sweepers that won $207 million in Ohio and a store clerk that stole a million-dollar lottery ticket from a customer in Texas and fled to Nepal with the cash!

programme.title: Lottery Changed My Life

programme.title: Lottery Changed My Life

programme.title: Cellblock 6: Female Lock Up
programme.desc: Two best friends share a heroin addiction and go repeatedly through the system; a prostitute struggles to overcome her past.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction

programme.title: My Strange Addiction
programme.desc: Evelyn drinks air freshener every day, and Sydney is obsessed with having the world's longest neck.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction
programme.desc: Forty-four year old twins Amy and Becky are addicted to being identical, looking alike, acting alike, and even weighing their meals to stay the exact same size. Meanwhile, Jennifer has been addicted to eating mattresses for over 20 years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction

programme.desc: Kevin constantly covers his body in plaster casts. Melissa is incapable of making decision without consulting a psychic.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction
programme.desc: Jillian has been addicted to smelling pine cleaner for two years and can't go more than 15 minutes without a fix. Meanwhile, Scott is obsessed with picking up dead animals from the road.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction

programme.title: My Strange Addiction

programme.title: My Strange Addiction

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: With her weight spiraling, Tammy makes a life-altering decision. Amy finally gets a taste of the life she's always wanted, but, unfortunately, it's short-lived. An emergency surgery has repercussions for Chris.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Tammy is back from rehab, and Amy kisses her freedom goodbye as she comes to a drastic decision regarding her sister. With his bariatric surgery on the line, Chris tries to shed the weight he's gained but is shocked when he and Tammy step on the scale.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Amy is upset that Tammy's new nurse isn't pushing her enough. Tammy has started slacking, and the family worries about what could be the cause. Chris and Tammy clash when he confronts her about the new man in her life.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Paula has had a tough life and, at more than 600 pounds, has built a wall around herself to push people away. When she suddenly loses someone she loves, Paula can no longer ignore the threat of losing her own life -- especially for her children's sake.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: At 670 pounds Ashley must live in her parents' home with her husband. Desperate to save her life and her marriage, she decides it's time for a drastic change.

programme.desc: Most of the extreme weight on Tracey's body resides in her shockingly misshapen legs. They're so massive with severe lymphedema, that gastric surgery is her only chance of survival. Brenda and Melissa prepare for skin removal surgery.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive

programme.desc: Jennifer used to do everything with her family, but a car accident five years ago led to severe weight gain and a massive lymphedema on her leg. Jennifer feels like bariatric surgery is her last chance to regain mobility and get her family life back.

programme.title: Too Large
programme.desc: Plagued by health problems, Meghan hopes to get weight loss surgery along with her overweight best friend, Vannessa. Vannessa is afraid of trying to lose weight only to fail. When she sees Meghan successfully lose weight, however, she changes her mind.

programme.desc: George is a kind-hearted kindergarten teacher who weighs nearly 700 pounds. He is determined to lose weight to help him win back his ex-girlfriend. As George works hard to lose weight, he discovers that the love he has been missing most is self-love.

programme.desc: The wardens investigate several accidents caused by the mud, including rescuing a boy who was caught in a flash flood. Also, Parker investigates an ATV hit-and-run.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The Wardens use night vision to catch night hunters and poachers. Then, Warden Laflamme must take matters into his own hands to protect the public from a tragic outcome.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The Warden Service kicks into high gear as they search for poachers and crack down on dangerous activity with firearms.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Two teams of Wardens join forces to bust ATV scofflaws and end up in a dramatic high-speed chase.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Summer has arrived and people are filling up the woods and causing trouble. MacCabe finds a campsite where the occupants seem to have vanished, and the wardens search for a pot grow op after a drug deal went wrong.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Some of the wardens enter the annual moose-hunting lottery. Meanwhile, Craven tracks down the mythical Main mountain lion and the wardens try to find an elderly man lost in the woods.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Up in the North Woods along the Canadian border, things are very different. A warden looking for smugglers encounters a drunk driver with a gun, and a suicidal man enters the woods with a shotgun.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A new class of wardens are being trained to do search and rescues. A hiker vanishes on the Appalachian trail and the wardens lead one of the largest search and rescue operations in Maine's history to find her.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A look back at the most exciting moments and never-before-seen stories.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A notorious gang of poachers are up to their old tricks. Also, the wardens stop some suspects from fleeing the state and the forensic team investigates who shot at a woman in her backyard.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The rule is clear: one hunter one deer. But some hunters are greedy and the wardens are there to stop them. Plus, a deputy joins his first night-hunting stakeout, LaFlamme searches for an arrow that can help solve a mystery and a family covers up a crime.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A Facebook post leads the wardens to a gang of poachers, which turns into a manhunt when the ringleader skips bail. The wardens capture a flock of nuisance wild turkeys and search all night for a rabbit hunter lost in the snowy woods.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A sledder takes a jump that lands him in the hospital and the wardens investigate the crash. The wardens chase down a group of drunk snowmobilers. A strange pile of animal parts in the snow leads the wardens to a family of poachers.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A Smartphone with video evidence of a crime leads to a poacher. Two drunken sledders run over a warden and are chased through the woods. Herring hunts down a man that he knows with arrest warrants. LaFlamme helps a herd of deer in distress.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The start of the busy tourist season has the wardens out in full force. A dangerous fox is on the loose in a crowded campground-the wardens need to find it fast. An ATV rider appears to have been partying too hard and nearly causes a wipe out.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: As winter melts into spring, all kinds of wildlife are emerging, from baby raccoons to hungry black bears. A routine littering summons turns into a face off with a rabid pitbull. Some new evidence comes to light to revive an old deer poaching case.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Teams use helicopters to radio-collar moose. The wardens rescue two skiers lost in the backcountry. A drunk sledder is caught and blames his nephew. A warden extinguishes a barn fire. A man with outstanding poaching warrants is arrested.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Spring arrives and things start plunging through the ice. The wardens investigate a case of injured bald eagles.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: In Maine, a game warden's job changes with the seasons. Sergeant Spahr helps a fledgling owl that has taken a tumble and Warden Stevens and a medical team look for a distressed hiker into the night.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The entire warden service pulls together for a massive search effort for a missing boy. A second search for a lost hiker stretches the wardens to their limit. A pair of salmon poachers are caught in the act and a new K-9 is trained.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: An ATV trail becomes the site of a high-speed chase when a man with an outstanding warrant attempts to flee from the Maine Warden Service. With the weather warming up, the wardens deal with intentional violators and serial offenders while enforcing laws.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The wardens work around the clock to handle turkey hunting season and smelt runs. A search warrant is needed upon the discovery of poached turkeys. The wardens come across many animals including orphaned baby foxes, nuisance beavers and a python.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Fourth of July is one of the biggest weekends of the year in Maine and crowds are out to celebrate. Warden Ryan Fitzpatrick and Caribou PD join forces when a group of fifty teens trash private property during a wild bonfire party.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The wardens battle illegal marijuana across the state. It is dangerous work that often sees armed individuals protecting their land. Three teens are involved in an ATV crash that has the wardens stumped.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Most of the wildlife in Maine consists of moose, bear and deer. However, on occasion exotic animals make their way into the state and the wardens need to be prepared for anything. This time Sergeant Spahr wrangles a Boa Constrictor.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Summer has arrived and people are filling up the woods and causing trouble. MacCabe finds a campsite where the occupants seem to have vanished, and the wardens search for a pot grow op after a drug deal went wrong.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Some of the wardens enter the annual moose-hunting lottery. Meanwhile, Craven tracks down the mythical Main mountain lion and the wardens try to find an elderly man lost in the woods.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Up in the North Woods along the Canadian border, things are very different. A warden looking for smugglers encounters a drunk driver with a gun, and a suicidal man enters the woods with a shotgun.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Warden Blanchard shows a high school student there is no such thing as a boring day on the job. Warden LaFlamme is promoted to Corporal of Landowner Relations and passes the responsibilities of his district on to Warden Lounder.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: During the holiday season, Pete Herring visits a children's hospital in Portland with members of the K-9 unit and Alan Curtis donates game to a soup kitchen. Later, Scott Thrasher invites everyone to his home for a potluck supper.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Water recreation season has the wardens out in full force. The Dive Team suits up to respond to an emergency search and recovery call, An ATV rider with a camera on his helmet films his own crash and undercover safety patrols lead to potential OUI busts.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: As sportsmen arrive to take part in Maine's big game season, the wardens keep a watchful eye for night hunters and track down a deer poacher. Then, some hunters from out of state get a lesson in Maine's hunting laws.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Autumn's arrival brings hunters heading for the woods, keeping the wardens busy. While some obey the rules, others try to get around them. Sergeant Simmons and Warden McKenney investigate a poached moose.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: With the arrival of fall comes the great Maine moose season. Warden MacCabe goes on a six day hunt and takes you along for the ride. Also, wardens investigate a double moose kill, one of the worst wildlife crimes there is.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The game wardens are on the lookout for over eager sportsmen trying to bend the rules as the season comes to close. One warden catches a Canadian posing as an American while others bring a fugitive to justice.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The game wardens are guardians of Maine's wildlife, but they also protect the public. Warden Carter must find an injured bear. A search is mounted for a missing man in the woods. Wardens MacCabe and Stevens track down hunters.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The tail end of deer season tempts empty-handed hunters to break the law. The wardens work round the clock shifts to catch a night hunter and a family of armed felons. Spahr and Blanchard investigate a pair of deer shot under suspicious circumstances.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Maine's busy deer hunting season keeps the wardens on their toes. An intentional violator in Aroostook County is busted night hunting. A hunter misidentifies his target and shoots an antlerless deer and feuding neighbors hamper the wardens' investigation.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: At the start of hunting season in Maine, the wardens nab violators who are illegally illuminating wildlife, firing guns from their vehicles, and hunting over baited deer stands. Warden Lounder finds himself in a dangerous situation when he is surrounded.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: In the final weeks of moose season, not everyone is following the rules. The wardens investigate a family suspected of killing and wasting a moose. Blanchard and Christianson have to stop an illegally harvested moose from crossing the border.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The ORBIS McDonnell Douglas DC-10 is the world's only flying eye hospital with an interior redesigned to house a state-of-the-art ophthalmic hospital complete with an operating room, a laser treatment facility and a high-tech classroom.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The Martin Mars water bomber is the world's biggest seaplane. Originally built in 1945 for the U.S. Navy, it was converted to a water bomber in 1958 and has since flown more than 8,000 firefighting missions.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The Airbus A380 is the world's first full double-deck passenger aircraft, a groundbreaking design in aviation history. We document the construction and delivery of a new aircraft, and Lufthansa's first commercial flight from Frankfort to San Francisco.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The Skibird is the lifeblood of remote science camps in Greenland and Antarctica, carrying supplies, fuel and crew to these outer worldly locations. The LC-130 Hercules Skibirds are operated by the New York Air National Guard's 109th Airlift Wing.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The Antonov 124 is the world's largest serially manufactured cargo plane. Built to move Soviet military vehicles and equipment, they are now in constant demand moving everything from locomotives to whales anywhere in the world.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The C-5 Galaxy is the biggest and most powerful plane in the U.S. Air Force fleet. Follow its mission into a war zone, from initial briefing to descent into Bagram, Afghanistan.

programme.desc: In July 2002, a passenger plane and cargo plane collide after the passenger plane receives conflicting instructions from air traffic control and the aircraft's anti-collision equipment.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: In December 1995, a state-of-the-art Boeing 757 bound for Cali, Colombia, slammed into a mountain after going 19 kilometres off-course. The investigation reveals that the pilots were baffled by the plane's sophisticated automation.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: In 1990, a Columbian flight hit a massive storm on its way to New York, forcing the plane to remain in a holding pattern above the city. Finally running out of fuel, the plane crashes into a wealthy suburb, resulting in controversial conclusions.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: In April 1998, Aloha Airlines Flight 243 took off from Maui for a short island hop to Honolulu; at 24,000 feet, a huge chunk of the plane's roof and walls broke off but against all odds the plane lands safely.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: A three-man crew of a DHL A300 are thrown into the fight of their lives on what was supposed to he a routine 'mail run' in Baghdad. Experience the men's intense sixteen-minute struggle without hydraulics to put the plane back down on the runway.

programme.desc: Wardens Reneau and Stovall suspect a couple of illegally shooting a deer. Later, Warden Iles transports orphaned armadillo pups to be rehabilitated, while Warden Gould searches for a mountain lion lurking near a Laredo recreational park.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia is short-staffed, but finding a parolee who is prepared for the demands of the job is proving difficult. Then, when Tia hears about a pack of pit bulls running in the street, the team races to the rescue and find an overwhelmed owner.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: When a sinkhole threatens to swallow a nearby neighborhood, Tia teams up with cat expert Jackson Galaxy to rescue dozens of cats. And, after finding a neglected mama dog near the warehouse, Tia and her team span out to try and find her puppies.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.sub-title: The Heart of a Pit Bull
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff performs emergency surgery on a pit bull and makes a surprising discovery. Dr. Baier treats a goat kicked by a horse. A couple drives all night hoping the team can fix their dog's shattered leg. And Dr. Baier and Hector treat an injured ostrich.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A badly injured tortoise needs an innovative procedure and an eagle's death is investigated. Out on the lake, wardens educate the public on staying safe. As night falls, a car crash turns into a manhunt.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: For Texas game wardens, the unexpected is all part of the routine. A shrimp boat tries to make a run for it. One warden makes some furry friends. A simple trespass warning turns into a trip to jail. A warden helps a woman spiraling out of control.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: In Jasper County, Game Warden Boone responds to a venomous rattlesnake. Game wardens investigate the illegal killing of a goose in the Texas Panhandle. In South Texas, Game Wardens follow up on a tip about a man going over the fishing limit.

programme.title: Jade Fever
programme.desc: Claudia is forced to drive the rock truck as her crew struggles up the rocky trail to their mountaintop jade camp, Wolverine.

programme.title: Jade Fever
programme.desc: Tensions come to a boil as Claudia, Robin and crew attempt to get people and equipment to their remote jade camp.

programme.title: Cold Water Cowboys
programme.desc: Captain Richard Gillett risks boat and crew to reach the crab grounds first; Captain Paul Tiller's small boat and aging crew need a strong start to their season, but a rogue wave snaps his stabilizer in half before they catch a single crab.

programme.title: Cold Water Cowboys
programme.desc: To catch herring, Richard takes on a gamble that puts his season and his crew at risk; Paul wants to beat other boats out to his favourite turbot spot; Justin's only hope of gaining respect is to find the elusive crab and put money in the bank.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete journeys to Kauai to build a sky-wave treehouse for a couple who ditched the mainland for a laid-back lifestyle and transforms a bohemian treehouse for two former professional surfers into a masterpiece with a crow's nest 60 ft off the ground.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete heads to Alabama's Appalachia to build a super spy treehouse. There, he pulls out all the stops to make the client's espionage-themed dreams come true. We're talking gadgets, hidden passageways, secret rooms and more.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: The NTS crew travels to an alpaca farm to build a lodge in the trees inspired by our National Parks. They create a structure to take in the mountain views with a 50 foot long cable bridge entrance and a deck devoted entirely to hammock lounging.

programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets
programme.desc: Dr. Hodges is in surgery when a baby goat in distress comes to the office.

programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets
programme.desc: The doctors are busy taking care of the rural Georgia animal population.

programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets
programme.desc: Drs. Hodges and Ferguson see an unusual patient in Georgia: an unruly camel.

programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets
programme.desc: Unusual pets, such as a chinchilla with a broken leg, test the docs’ veterinary skills.

programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets
programme.sub-title: A Litter of This, A Litter of That
programme.desc: Dr. Ferguson and vet tech Jordan treat a cat with an apparent ear infection.

programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets
programme.sub-title: Say Hello to my Little Bunny
programme.desc: The docs help a fainting goat and a mule that needs a pedicure.

programme.title: The Guardians
programme.desc: A look into the corruption inside Nevada's guardianship system. Seniors lose their wealth and wellbeing, while their adult children fight in court to free them.

programme.title: Legends of the Deep
programme.desc: Celine and Fabien Cousteau use cutting-edge technology to investigate the most credible UFO sighting in history, when a strange alien craft was spotted crashing into the ocean. What they discover might reveal hard evidence of extraterrestrial contact.

programme.title: Legends of the Deep
programme.desc: A dangerous stretch of water in the Mediterranean is the resting place of an infamous sunken ship, and using the latest tech, Celine and Fabien Cousteau investigate if it was deliberately attacked by spies on a top-secret mission.

programme.title: Legends of the Deep

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Already reeling from the oil collapse, the people of Fort McMurray, AB are determined to rise out of the ashes and rebuild bigger and better following the most destructive wild fire in Canadian history.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: The once struggling community of Bell Island, NL is hoping that their new and exciting ways of telling the island’s rich historical stories will draw boatloads of mainlanders to their beautiful east coast home.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Manitou Beach SK has a bit of a sinking feeling. The people of this former booming resort town are fighting hard times and rising water in hopes of returning to its glory days.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: With jobs lost and morale low, hope came at the right time for the people of Mattawa, Ontario. A much-loved ski hill has re-opened creating nostalgia and excitement for a community still suffering from a loss of industry.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Edgerton, Alberta’s farming industry has been suffering for years but a brewery started by a group of childhood friends might just get this community to bubble back to the top again.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Avondale was once a pit stop from one place to another but the community is excited about an offical NASCAR race track that will give people from all over the world a high octane reason to visit.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Despite the loss of a once-thriving logging industry, the people of Lake Cowichan will be two stepping back in to prosperity thanks to a huge country music festival that is making this community its permanent home.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: The people of Reston MB have survived recent natural disasters and economic troubles but their luck could turn around, thanks to a headline-making $10 lot program that has put the town on the map.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Tumbler Ridge has seen its fair share of economic highs and lows but a chance discovery of dinosaur tracks might just save this close knit community from extinction.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: The community of Norwood ON has just about everything you could want in a small town - except young families to fill the high school.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Vulcan was once known as 'The Wheat Capital of Canada' but after some lean times the community banded together and got wildly creative so that they can successfully live long and prosper.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: The people of Gilbert Plains MB have spent decades watching their small town decline, but thanks to marijuana’s cousin hemp the community might be on their way to a ground-breaking bounce back.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: No longer content to eke by on a drive-through economy defined by a constantly moving highway, the people of South River ON are hoping that their picture perfect surroundings become a destination unto its own.

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.desc: Arctic fox pups and black bear cubs enjoy a new world after the long cold days of winter.

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.desc: Killer whales and blue sharks are on the hunt as amorous fireflies light up the forest.

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.desc: Fall chronicles a remarkable season of change - young northern gannets leap off perilous cliffs as chipmunks race to gather winter supplies, and prairie rattlesnakes give birth to live young.

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.desc: Lynx hunting snowshoe hares in the boreal forest and the ancient dance between wolves and caribou on Canada's vast tundra reveal the harshest time of year when landscapes are transformed by the cruel and dramatic beauty of snow and ice.

programme.title: The Nature of Things

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.desc: Canadians push the limits of cold endurance while baby harp seals brave icy water and flying squirrels cuddle.

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.desc: Rain brings unexpected benefits for spadefoot toads, grizzlies, and whitewater kayakers, but too much can be deadly.

programme.title: The Nature of Things

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.desc: The driving force behind all weather, sunlight creates a banquet for blue whales, helps vultures soar, and is essential for training some extreme athletes.

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.desc: The Roadkill crew buys a 1969 Pontiac Firebird that hasn't run in 17 years, changing every mechanical bit of it in three days, and then hit the road for action.

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.sub-title: Racing One Lap of America! Kinda
programme.desc: Finnegan and Freiburger dive in to fix the Pontiac engine and hit the road to redemption; Tony caps it all off with merciless drifting in the Challenger SRT Hellcat that Elana and Freiburger were using to stomp the One Lap tracks.

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.sub-title: Rescuing an Old Drag Race Car
programme.desc: One of the cheapest ways to go racing is to buy someone else's abandoned project car. Finnegan and guest co-host Tony Angelo are about to find out if the guys got what they paid for.

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.sub-title: Hemi Gasser vs. Hemi Super Bee
programme.desc: It's the return of two popular, Mopar Hemi-powered Roadkill project cars: Mike Finnegan's 'Blasphemi' 1955 Chevy Gasser and David Freiburger's 'Rumble Bee' 1970 Dodge Super Bee.

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.desc: Freiburger makes a sight-unseen purchase of a 1973 AMC Hornet that raced Baja in the '80s and finished the NORRA 1000 a couple of times before being parked circa 2012.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: David and Steve show how to install a ProCharger centrifugal supercharger on any carbureted V-8.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.sub-title: Budget Handling Upgrades for Vanishing Paint
programme.desc: David and Steve improve a 1970 Dodge Challenger with a homegrown package of average-guy suspension add-ons.

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.desc: Roadkill fans always ask to see a competition with hosts David Freiburger and Mike Finnegan. They each buy a car for $1,500 and enter the Optima Ultimate Street Car Invitational in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.sub-title: The Lost Episode: Roadkill on Power Tour
programme.desc: David and Mike went on the Hot Rod Power Tour road trip with a bunch of project cars and shot footage for a show that never came to be. Now, that has become the lost episode that never aired.

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.desc: David Freiburger and Mike Finnegan finally get together with Marty and Moog of Mighty Car Mods, Australia's most popular YouTube show for gearheads.

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.desc: JP Magazine Editor Rick Péwé, who has been doing barn-find rescues and road trips with David Freiburger since before there was a Roadkill, are at it again here, revisiting a 1946 Willys flatfender Jeep they first pulled from the fields of Utah in 2001.

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.sub-title: Junkyard Turbo 5.0 Power for the Rotsun!
programme.desc: The world's most revered rust bucket gets powered by a used Ford 5.0L Mustang V-8 with a Power Stroke diesel turbo!

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.desc: The legendary Rotsun 1971 Datsun 240Z that was stuffed with a Ford 5.0L and a Power Stroke turbodiesel on Episode 64, and the 1969 Chevey Impala.

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.desc: David Freiburger and Mike Finnegan head to Englewood, Colorado, and visit the Corns family -- builders of a crazy radial-Cessna-powered 1939 Plymouth truck. They also find an abandoned 1969 Ford Mustang Mach 1.

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.desc: The Roadkill crew buys a 1969 Pontiac Firebird that hasn't run in 17 years, changing every mechanical bit of it in three days, and then hit the road for action.

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.sub-title: Hemi Gasser vs. Hemi Super Bee
programme.desc: It's the return of two popular, Mopar Hemi-powered Roadkill project cars: Mike Finnegan's 'Blasphemi' 1955 Chevy Gasser and David Freiburger's 'Rumble Bee' 1970 Dodge Super Bee.

programme.title: Roadkill Classics
programme.desc: Freiburger makes a sight-unseen purchase of a 1973 AMC Hornet that raced Baja in the '80s and finished the NORRA 1000 a couple of times before being parked circa 2012.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: At the Pebble Beach Concours, David sits in the original, fully functioning 1965 James Bond DB5, which breaks records at RM Sotheby's auction; back at The Guild Dan and Greg help an owner fulfill a dream of fully restoring a 1930 Ford Model A.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: The guys say goodbye to David's rusty Rat Rod and hello to a 1973 Lincoln that David believes should have stayed where it was found; Ron tries to figure out the brakes on a 1963 Buick Riviera; Mel finishes a special paint shade on a 1973 Alfa Jr.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: The mechanics struggle for space in the crowded garage; Scotty completes an engine repair and test drive of a 1966 Plymouth Belvedere; Brad is almost finished a 1956 Jaguar XK 140 when he discovers he can't get replacement parts for the brakes.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: Brad finishes a 1964 Pontiac GTO belonging to an owner who passed away shortly after work started; when the family arrives with the owner's ashes and a plan to drive back in the car, they are overwhelmed by the beautiful work.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: David and Janice are in France for the 80th Anniversary of the Circuit des Remparts car show, race and rally. Back at the shop, a few of the guys talk through restorations they've done on their own cars.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: David and Janice explore a 1913 Sizaire-Berwick and a 1914 Cyclecar belonging to David's friend and visit another eccentric French collector.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: In France, David and car collector Trevor Leggat drive the 1,279-metre-long inner-city route with three hairpin turns; when the race begins, David and Janice are shocked at the speed and the restored vintage race cars that are participating.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: David fulfills a life-long dream of visiting the Cité de l'Automobile Museum in France, the largest car museum in the world; a drag racer, who broke his back in a motorcycle accident, brings his 1968 Pontiac Firebird to the Guild for some upgrades.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: David and Janice explore the Cité de l'Automobile's restoration department, where they find one of the world's most expensive cars, plus a rare Panhard Dynamic that David thought no longer existed.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: A 1977 Ford F250 barn find proves to be in better condition than David could have imagined; Janice takes the Guild girls out on a test drive in her 1961 Hillman Minx while David eyes it with envy.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: David and Janice are asked to judge The Magnificent 7 competition at Atlanta Concours d'Elegance.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: Ron and Greg discover strange home restoration work on a 1970 Dodge Charger; Johnney finishes up a full custom job on a 1957 Cadillac Eldorado Brougham, once considered the world's most expensive car.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: Larry is excited by the advancement of the 1948 Delahaye 135MS Cabriolet and the custom Mercury; Ron struggles with the seized engine of a 1930 Dodge pickup truck; David welcomes the arrival of a Belly Tank Racer.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: A 1977 Ford F250 pickup truck makes a miraculous evolution from barn find to beauty; Brad has a challenging time figuring out the unusual engine of an obscure 1966 Honda S600.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: Brad takes on a 1925 International Fire Truck but finding parts will be next to impossible; Ron is shaken after a test drive when a 1962 Chevrolet Impala SS makes horrific noises.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: David and Janice visit their friend Tim, who has two new McLarens with the same serial number and matching carbon fiber bodies.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: The Guild is approached to restore a 1997 Land Rover Defender 90 as a tribute to Rob Stewart.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: The shop overflows with muscle cars. David focuses on his new antique-watch business and Ron starts the brakes on a 2967 Ford Mustang Convertible.

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.desc: Lowell purchased a 1967 Dodge Coronet 440 and planned to restore it, but ended up taking an early retirement. His son Geoff wants to save the money to restore it, so Lowell called for help.

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.desc: John has his third Road Runner, a '69 convertible, and it needs a new engine.

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.desc: After waiting for over 30 years, Rayce finally inherits the 1970 Monte Carlo.

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.desc: With a family's help, the team steals a 1965 Ford Thunderbird from a deputy sheriff.

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.desc: Tanner and his dad Wade love cars. Wade wanted to fix up his 1967 Chevy Chevelle, but doesn't have the time. Tanner becomes the youngest 'accomplice' ever on the show as he prepares to overhaul his father's Chevelle.

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.desc: The crew tricks Katy into believing that her beloved '67 Nova was towed.

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.desc: Sixteen years ago an accident left Mike with a broken neck, back and broken nose. But after rehab, his healthy lifestyle and exercise program impress everyone around him. Watch as his dream of owning a Mustang like "Gone in 60 Seconds" is brought to life.

programme.title: Fast N' Loud
programme.desc: Former Gas Monkey Tom Smith gets out his frustrations by taking over Richard's cameras and crew to do his own special! He's counting down his 31 top builds, rocking racers and favourite flips that made his time as a Monkey so memorable.

programme.title: Fast N' Loud

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.desc: The crew tricks Katy into believing that her beloved '67 Nova was towed.

programme.title: Overhaulin'

programme.desc: Track racers from Tulsa call out the 405 with hopes of taking down the 'fastest street-raced cars in the country.' Farmtruck and AZN attempt a garage sale. Both Murder Nova and Chuck upgrade to twin turbo.

programme.desc: OKC racers take on the fastest of the south at the annual Cash Days race. While fishing for street races and fast cash, Farmtruck and AZN meet their match.

programme.title: Street Outlaws

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Oklahoma City's fastest take on the trash-talking street racers from Chicago. When many of the races get rained out, both sides agree to a rematch in Oklahoma. Meanwhile, the Farmtruck is back to its old 'fishing' ways, reeling in a Ferrari and a Camaro.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The Farmtruck is back, with a new motor and Chuck has his turbos lined out on The Death Trap. They both want back on the list. It's a war on the streets of the 405 with some of the fastest, closest drag racing ever.

programme.title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
programme.desc: Josey Wales (Clint Eastwood) watches helplessly as his wife and child are murdered, by Union men led by Capt. Terrill (Bill McKinney). Seeking revenge, Wales joins the Confederate Army. He refuses to surrender when the war ends, but his fellow soldiers go to hand over their weapons -- and are massacred by Terrill. Wales guns down some of Terrill's men and flees to Texas, where he tries to make a new life for himself, but the bounty on his head endangers him and his new surrogate family.

programme.desc: The close bond between cousins Mark Corona and Paul Stoeppler is quickly severed when one of them is murdered in cold blood; never-before-seen home movie video and shocking CCTV reveals what happened.

programme.desc: Hyrah Frasch is no ordinary baby; the photogenic 1-year-old already has her own website and looks set to become an internet sensation.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Wealthy and glamorous 78-year-old widow Jean Schwarzkopf is determined not to give up on life and is soon a fixture on the Florida social scene; Jean's new friends are not all they seem and her family is drawn into a dark world of crime and violence.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Rob and Lisa Whedbee are a beautiful couple who turn heads wherever they go; then a medical trauma upends their happy family, setting them on a path of destruction that will end in lies, accusations and a brutal home invasion.

programme.title: Home Invasion Homicide
programme.desc: Two intruders invade the peaceful Maine home of a married couple and their teenage son; when police arrive, they find one man dead and the rest of the family traumatized; the race is on to expose the cunning architect of this senseless crime (New!).

programme.title: JonBenét Ramsey: What Really Happened?
programme.desc: An exploration of the 1996 murder of 6-year-old JonBenét Ramsey, including interviews with her father, John, and her brother, John Andrew, as well as the audio diaries of Lou Smit, the late Colorado Springs homicide detective who worked on the case (New!).

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: When a 15-year-old girl vanishes from her front porch, police must uncover when she was last seen, where she might have been going and who would have wanted her dead.

programme.title: JonBenét Ramsey: What Really Happened?
programme.desc: An exploration of the 1996 murder of 6-year-old JonBenét Ramsey, including interviews with her father, John, and her brother, John Andrew, as well as the audio diaries of Lou Smit, the late Colorado Springs homicide detective who worked on the case (New!).

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: When a German U-571 submarine with a sophisticated encryption machine onboard is sunk during a World War II battle at sea, the Allies send an American Navy force led by Lieutenant Andrew Tyler (Matthew McConaughey) to retrieve it for study. Boarding the German ship, the Americans' cover as a rescue force is quickly blown. Forced to take the crew hostage, the Americans lay their explosives and prepare to destroy the German vessel before the Nazis can send naval backup.

During World War I, two British soldiers -- Lance Cpl. Schofield and Lance Cpl. Blake -- receive seemingly impossible orders. In a race against time, they must cross over into enemy territory to deliver a message that could potentially save 1,600 of their fellow comrades -- including Blake's own brother.

programme.title: Hoosiers
programme.desc: Failed college coach Norman Dale (Gene Hackman) gets a chance at redemption when he is hired to direct the basketball program at a high school in a tiny Indiana town. After a teacher (Barbara Hershey) persuades star player Jimmy Chitwood to quit and focus on his long-neglected studies, Dale struggles to develop a winning team in the face of community criticism for his temper and his unconventional choice of assistant coach: Shooter (Dennis Hopper), a notorious alcoholic.

programme.title: The Natural
programme.desc: On the way to a tryout with the Chicago Cubs, young baseball phenom Roy Hobbs (Robert Redford) is shot by the unstable Harriet Bird (Barbara Hershey). After 16 years, Hobbs returns to pro baseball as a rookie for the last-place New York Knights. Despite early arguments with his manager, Pop Fisher (Wilford Brimley), Hobbs becomes one of the best players in the league, and the Knights start winning. But this upsets the Judge (Robert Prosky), their owner, who wants Hobbs to lose games, not win.

programme.title: Django Unchained
programme.desc: Two years before the Civil War, Django (Jamie Foxx), a slave, finds himself accompanying an unorthodox German bounty hunter named Dr. King Schultz (Christoph Waltz) on a mission to capture the vicious Brittle brothers. Their mission successful, Schultz frees Django, and together they hunt the South's most-wanted criminals. Their travels take them to the infamous plantation of shady Calvin Candie (Leonardo DiCaprio), where Django's long-lost wife (Kerry Washington) is still a slave.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: In a Mexico City wracked by a recent wave of kidnappings, ex-CIA operative John Creasy (Denzel Washington) reluctantly accepts a job as a bodyguard for 9-year-old Lupita (Dakota Fanning), the daughter of wealthy businessman Samuel Ramos (Marc Anthony). Just as Creasy begins to develop a fondness for the young girl, a bloodthirsty gunman (Jesús Ochoa) kidnaps her. Now, Creasy must pick off a succession of corrupt cops and criminals to reach his ultimate object of vengeance.

programme.title: Gloria Bell
programme.desc: A free-spirited divorcee spends her nights on the dance floor, joyfully letting loose at clubs around Los Angeles. She soon finds herself thrust into an unexpected new romance, filled with the joys of budding love and the complications of dating.

programme.title: Palm Swings
programme.desc: After moving to Palm Springs, a young married couple are surprised to learn that neighbors are swingers.

During World War I, two British soldiers -- Lance Cpl. Schofield and Lance Cpl. Blake -- receive seemingly impossible orders. In a race against time, they must cross over into enemy territory to deliver a message that could potentially save 1,600 of their fellow comrades -- including Blake's own brother.

programme.title: Broken Diamonds
programme.desc: A young writer sees his dream put in jeopardy when he has to take care of his mentally ill sister.

programme.title: Fruitvale Station
programme.desc: Though he once spent time in San Quentin, 22-year-old black man Oscar Grant (Michael B. Jordan) is now trying hard to live a clean life and support his girlfriend (Melonie Diaz) and young daughter (Ariana Neal). Flashbacks reveal the last day in Oscar's life, in which he accompanied his family and friends to San Francisco to watch fireworks on New Year's Eve, and, on the way back home, became swept up in an altercation with police that ended in tragedy. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Songs My Brothers Taught Me
programme.desc: Johnny and his sister Jashuan live with their single mother on a reservation. When their absentee father dies, Johnny feels compelled to strike out for a new life in LA, but fears leaving his sister behind.

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally...
programme.desc: In 1977, college graduates Harry Burns (Billy Crystal) and Sally Albright (Meg Ryan) share a contentious car ride from Chicago to New York, during which they argue about whether men and women can ever truly be strictly platonic friends. Ten years later, Harry and Sally meet again at a bookstore, and in the company of their respective best friends, Jess (Bruno Kirby) and Marie (Carrie Fisher), attempt to stay friends without sex becoming an issue between them.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Just released from prison, all Rudy Duncan (Ben Affleck) wants is to start a new life with Ashley (Charlize Theron), the girl of his dreams, whom he met through pen pal letters in prison. But between them and happiness stands her crazy brother, Gabriel (Gary Sinise), and his motley crue of deadly criminals who think Rudy has some inside information about a casino where he once had a job -- a casino Gabriel and his short-fused posse plan to take down.

programme.title: Queenpins
programme.desc: A frustrated suburban housewife and her best friend hatch an illegal coupon-club scheme that scams millions from corporations and delivers deals to legions of fellow coupon clippers. Hot on their trail is an unlikely duo -- a hapless loss-prevention officer and a determined U.S. postal inspector -- both looking to end their criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Last Call
programme.desc: A successful developer must decide whether to raze or resurrect his family's bar after returning to the blue-collar Philadelphia neighborhood of his youth.

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally...
programme.desc: In 1977, college graduates Harry Burns (Billy Crystal) and Sally Albright (Meg Ryan) share a contentious car ride from Chicago to New York, during which they argue about whether men and women can ever truly be strictly platonic friends. Ten years later, Harry and Sally meet again at a bookstore, and in the company of their respective best friends, Jess (Bruno Kirby) and Marie (Carrie Fisher), attempt to stay friends without sex becoming an issue between them.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Just released from prison, all Rudy Duncan (Ben Affleck) wants is to start a new life with Ashley (Charlize Theron), the girl of his dreams, whom he met through pen pal letters in prison. But between them and happiness stands her crazy brother, Gabriel (Gary Sinise), and his motley crue of deadly criminals who think Rudy has some inside information about a casino where he once had a job -- a casino Gabriel and his short-fused posse plan to take down.

programme.title: Queenpins
programme.desc: A frustrated suburban housewife and her best friend hatch an illegal coupon-club scheme that scams millions from corporations and delivers deals to legions of fellow coupon clippers. Hot on their trail is an unlikely duo -- a hapless loss-prevention officer and a determined U.S. postal inspector -- both looking to end their criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When an inner-city Detroit foster mother (Fionnula Flanagan) is murdered in a botched holdup, four of her now-grown adopted children suspect it was no random killing. Rising musician Jack (Garrett Hedlund), former-Marine Angel (Tyrese Gibson), hotheaded hockey player Bobby (Mark Wahlberg) and settled-down husband and father Jeremiah (André Benjamin) go on the hunt for neighborhood criminal kingpin Victor Sweet (Chiwetel Ejiofor) while being trailed themselves by the local beat cops.

programme.title: American Honey
programme.desc: Star (Sasha Lane), an adolescent girl from a troubled home, runs away with a traveling sales crew that drives across the American Midwest selling subscriptions door-to-door. Finding her feet in this gang of teenagers, one of whom is Jake (Shia LaBeouf), she soon gets into the group's lifestyle of hard-partying nights, law-bending days and young love.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Girl
programme.desc: Lovestruck Dustin (Jason Biggs) is dating Alexis (Kate Hudson), his ideal girlfriend, but when she dumps him for coming on too strong, Dustin takes drastic measures to win her back. He asks his pal Tank (Dane Cook) to take her on a horrible date so that she will come running back to him, and Tank happily agrees. However, Alexis is more than a match for Tank's shock tactics, leaving him torn between loyalty to Dustin and a growing attraction toward Alexis.

programme.title: Borg vs. McEnroe
programme.desc: It's the summer of 1980, and Björn Borg is the top tennis player in the world, dominating the sport both on and off the court. A powerful and rigorously disciplined player, there is only one obstacle in his pursuit of a record-breaking fifth Wimbledon championship: the highly talented but ferociously abrasive young American John McEnroe. With three days until the tournament begins, Borg trains religiously in his lavish Monaco home, aided by his coach and mentor Lennart and girlfriend Mariana.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: When decorated military officer Chris Vaughn (The Rock) returns to his hometown in the state of Washington to find work, he finds that the lumber mill has closed, and the town's big business is now a seedy casino operated by one of his old schoolmates, Jay Hamilton (Neal McDonough). Aided by his loyal friend Ray Templeton (Johnny Knoxville), Vaughn tries to make a stand against the area's crime and corruption, but, finding no help from the police, he must take matters into his own hands.

programme.title: Queen Bees
programme.desc: While her house undergoes repairs, fiercely independent senior Helen temporarily moves into a nearby retirement community, where she encounters lusty widows, cutthroat bridge tournaments and a hotbed of bullying "mean girls.".

programme.title: Delivery Man
programme.desc: Amiable slacker David Wozniak (Vince Vaughn) drives a delivery truck for his family's company and is content with a life of mediocrity. However, when he learns that he is the biological father of more than 500 offspring and many of them are suing to learn his identity, he decides to hold himself accountable for his actions. He finds some of his progeny and becomes involved in their lives; however, when David's girlfriend announces her pregnancy, she keeps her expectations low.

programme.title: The Change-Up
programme.desc: Once inseparable pals, Dave (Jason Bateman) and Mitch (Ryan Reynolds) have drifted apart over the years. Dave is an overworked lawyer and family man, while Mitch has thus far avoided most of the normal responsibilities of adulthood. Each is envious of the other's life, and following a drunken binge, the men awake to find they have somehow switched bodies. Dave and Mitch soon discover that things are not as rosy as they seemed and try to find a way to return their lives to normal.

programme.title: L.A. Confidential
programme.desc: Three policemen, each with his own motives and obsessions, tackle the corruption surrounding an unsolved murder at a downtown Los Angeles coffee shop in the early 1950s. Detective Lieutenant Exley (Guy Pearce), the son of a murdered detective, is out to avenge his father's killing. The ex-partner of Officer White (Russell Crowe), implicated in a scandal rooted out by Exley, was one of the victims. Sergeant Vincennes (Kevin Spacey) feeds classified information to a tabloid magnate (Danny DeVito).

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: The last members of a dying Native American tribe, the Mohicans -- Uncas (Eric Schweig), his father Chingachgook (Russell Means), and his adopted half-white brother Hawkeye (Daniel Day-Lewis) -- live in peace alongside British colonists. But when the daughters (Madeleine Stowe, Jodhi May) of a British colonel are kidnapped by a traitorous scout, Hawkeye and Uncas must rescue them in the crossfire of a gruesome military conflict of which they wanted no part: the French and Indian War.

programme.title: Detainee 001
programme.desc: The complex legal story of John Walker Lindh, a young American who fell under the spell of the Taliban in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: Businessman Oskar Schindler (Liam Neeson) arrives in Krakow in 1939, ready to make his fortune from World War II, which has just started. After joining the Nazi party primarily for political expediency, he staffs his factory with Jewish workers for similarly pragmatic reasons. When the SS begins exterminating Jews in the Krakow ghetto, Schindler arranges to have his workers protected to keep his factory in operation, but soon realizes that in so doing, he is also saving innocent lives.

programme.title: Martin Eden
programme.desc: After Martin Eden meets Elena, he tries to achieve a place among the literary elite through self-education.

programme.title: The Fly
programme.desc: When scientist Andre Delambre (Al Hedison) tests his matter transporter on himself, an errant housefly makes its way into the transportation chamber, and things go horribly wrong. As a result, Delambre's head and arm are now that of the insect. Slowly losing himself to the fly, Delambre turns to his wife, Helene (Patricia Owens), for help. But when tragedy strikes, Delambre's brother (Vincent Price) and Inspector Charas (Herbert Marshall) are forced to pick up the investigation.

programme.title: Wizards
programme.desc: After the death of his mother, the evil mutant wizard Blackwolf (Steve Gravers) discovers some long-lost military technologies. Full of ego and ambition, Blackwolf claims his mother's throne, assembles an army and sets out to brainwash and conquer Earth. Meanwhile, Blackwolf's gentle twin brother, the bearded and sage Avatar (Bob Holt), calls upon his own magical abilities to foil Blackwolf's plans for world domination -- even if it means destroying his own flesh and blood.

programme.title: The Book of Life
programme.desc: In the Mexican town of San Angel, Manolo (Diego Luna), Maria (Zoë Saldana) and Joaquin (Channing Tatum) have been friends ever since childhood. Although their lives have taken different paths -- Maria was sent to Europe, Joaquin joined the military, and Manolo studied to become a bullfighter -- one thing remains the same: Manolo and Joaquin both want to marry Maria. Little does the trio know that battling husband-and-wife deities have made a high-stakes wager on the love triangle's outcome.

programme.title: Hedgehogs
programme.desc: Bobby the hedgehog joins forces with his animal friends to save their natural habitat from a human threat.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: Max (Louis C.K.) is a spoiled terrier who enjoys a comfortable life in a New York building until his owner adopts Duke, a giant and unruly canine. During their walk outside, they encounter a group of ferocious alley cats and wind up in a truck that's bound for the pound. Luckily, a rebellious bunny named Snowball swoops in to save the doggy duo from captivity. In exchange, Snowball demands that Max and Duke join his gang of abandoned pets on a mission against the humans who've done them wrong.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets 2
programme.desc: Explore the emotional lives of pets and the deep bond between them and the families that love them as Max, Gidget, Snowball and the rest of the gang take on new adventures and push themselves to find the courage to become their own heroes.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: Max (Louis C.K.) is a spoiled terrier who enjoys a comfortable life in a New York building until his owner adopts Duke, a giant and unruly canine. During their walk outside, they encounter a group of ferocious alley cats and wind up in a truck that's bound for the pound. programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets 2
programme.desc: Explore the emotional lives of pets and the deep bond between them and the families that love them as Max, Gidget, Snowball and the rest of the gang take on new adventures and push themselves to find the courage to become their own heroes.

programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: When Pete and Ellie decide to start a family, they stumble into the world of foster care adoption. They hope to take in one small child, but when they meet three siblings, including a rebellious 15-year-old girl, they find themselves speeding from zero to three kids overnight. Now, Pete and Ellie must try to learn the ropes of instant parenthood in the hope of becoming a family.

programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.title: Nine to Five
programme.desc: Office satire about three female secretaries who decide to get revenge on their tyrannical, sexist boss by abducting him and running the business themselves. The trio, one of whom has been passed over for promotion because she is a woman, spend a night together having drug-induced fantasies of killing the slave-driving chauvinist. One of them panics the following day when she suspects she really has poisoned the tyrant.

programme.title: Squad Car
programme.desc: An accused man (Don Marlowe) helps a policeman (Paul Bryar) investigate an airplane mechanic's death and a counterfeit racket.

programme.title: The Book of Life
programme.desc: In the Mexican town of San Angel, Manolo (Diego Luna), Maria (Zoë Saldana) and Joaquin (Channing Tatum) have been friends ever since childhood. Although their lives have taken different paths -- Maria was sent to Europe, Joaquin joined the military, and Manolo studied to become a bullfighter -- one thing remains the same: Manolo and Joaquin both want to marry Maria. Little does the trio know that battling husband-and-wife deities have made a high-stakes wager on the love triangle's outcome.

programme.title: The Fly
programme.desc: When scientist Andre Delambre (Al Hedison) tests his matter transporter on himself, an errant housefly makes its way into the transportation chamber, and things go horribly wrong. As a result, Delambre's head and arm are now that of the insect. Slowly losing himself to the fly, Delambre turns to his wife, Helene (Patricia Owens), for help. But when tragedy strikes, Delambre's brother (Vincent Price) and Inspector Charas (Herbert Marshall) are forced to pick up the investigation.

programme.title: All About Eve
programme.desc: Backstage story revolving around aspiring actress Eve Harrington. Tattered and forlorn, Eve shows up in the dressing room of Broadway mega-star Margo Channing, telling a melancholy life story to Margo and her friends. Margo takes Eve under her wing, and it appears that Eve is a conniver that uses Margo.

programme.title: The Three Faces of Eve
programme.desc: Suffering from headaches and inexplicable blackouts, timid housewife Eve White (Joanne Woodward) begins seeing a psychiatrist, Dr. Luther (Lee J. Cobb). He's stunned when she transforms before his eyes into the lascivious Eve Black, and diagnoses her as having multiple personalities. It's not long before a third, calling herself Jane, also appears. Through hypnosis and continued therapy, Luther struggles to help Eve recall the trauma that caused her identity to fracture.

programme.title: Nine to Five
programme.desc: Office satire about three female secretaries who decide to get revenge on their tyrannical, sexist boss by abducting him and running the business themselves. The trio, one of whom has been passed over for promotion because she is a woman, spend a night together having drug-induced fantasies of killing the slave-driving chauvinist. One of them panics the following day when she suspects she really has poisoned the tyrant.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: When their parents decide to sell their home, siblings Maura (Amy Poehler) and Kate (Tina Fey) learn that they have one weekend to clean out the junk from their old bedroom. Unhappy with the news, the recently divorced Maura and her hotheaded sister make plans to throw one final bash to recapture their glory days with their former classmates. As the raging party begins to spiral out of control, the gals soon realize that there may not be a house left once the dust settles.

programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: When Pete and Ellie decide to start a family, they stumble into the world of foster care adoption. They hope to take in one small child, but when they meet three siblings, including a rebellious 15-year-old girl, they find themselves speeding from zero to three kids overnight. Now, Pete and Ellie must try to learn the ropes of instant parenthood in the hope of becoming a family.

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: Walter Meyer (Danny Glover) is a retired mechanic who lost the love of his life one year earlier. Now that the holiday season is here, he invites daughters Rachel (Gabrielle Union) and Cheryl (Kimberly Elise) and sons Christian (Romany Malco) and Evan (Jessie T. Usher) to his house for a traditional celebration. Poor Walter soon realizes that if his bickering children and the rest of the family can spend five days together under the same roof, it will truly be a Christmas miracle.

programme.title: FXM Presents

He's stunned when she transforms before his eyes into the lascivious Eve Black, and diagnoses her as having multiple personalities. It's not long before a third, calling herself Jane, also appears. Through hypnosis and continued therapy, Luther struggles to help Eve recall the trauma that caused her identity to fracture.

programme.title: The Rocket Man
programme.desc: An orphan (George Winslow) zaps his town with a spaceman's ray gun that makes people tell the truth.

programme.title: All About Eve
programme.desc: Backstage story revolving around aspiring actress Eve Harrington. Tattered and forlorn, Eve shows up in the dressing room of Broadway mega-star Margo Channing, telling a melancholy life story to Margo and her friends. Margo takes Eve under her wing, and it appears that Eve is a conniver that uses Margo.

programme.title: The Song of Bernadette
programme.desc: Based on the popular novel by Franz Werfel, this drama focuses on Bernadette Soubirous (Jennifer Jones), a young French woman who experiences vivid visions of the Virgin Mary. While many dismiss her claims, certain people, including the priest Dominique Peyramale (Charles Bickford), slowly begin to believe her. Eventually, Bernadette is deemed a saint, and becomes a nun at a convent, where she must deal with jealousy from others who resent her revered status.

programme.title: The Robe
programme.desc: In this biblical epic, a drunk and disillusioned Roman, Marcellus Gallio (Richard Burton), wins Jesus' robe in a dice game after the crucifixion. Marcellus has never been a man of faith like his slave, Demetrius (Victor Mature), but when Demetrius escapes with the robe, Marcellus experiences disturbing visions and feels guilty for his actions. Convinced that destroying the robe will cure him, Marcellus sets out to find Demetrius -- and discovers his Christian faith along the way.

programme.title: Demetrius and the Gladiators
programme.desc: In this sequel to "The Robe," the corrupt emperor Caligula (Jay Robinson) believes that the sacred robe of Christ has magical powers, and will stop at nothing to obtain it. When Demetrius (Victor Mature) refuses to help Caligula find the holy object, Caligula has him arrested and forces him to fight in the arena in battles to the death. As Demetrius faces trial after trial, his faith in Christ is pushed to its limits, as he sees no point in the endless suffering he is forced to endure.

programme.title: The Star
programme.desc: A small but brave donkey named Bo yearns for a life beyond his daily grind at the village mill. One day, he finds the courage to break free, embarking on the adventure of his dreams. On his journey, he teams up with Ruth, a lovable sheep who has lost her flock, and Dave, a dove who has lofty aspirations. Along with three camels and some eccentric stable animals, Bo and his new friends follow the Star and become accidental heroes in the greatest story ever told -- the first Christmas.

programme.title: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
programme.desc: When his beloved grandfather leaves Jake clues to a mystery that spans different worlds and times, he finds a magical place known as Miss Peregrine's School for Peculiar Children. But the mystery and danger deepen as he gets to know the residents and learns about their special powers - and their terrifying enemies. Ultimately, Jake discovers that only his own special peculiarity can save his new friends. Based on the novel "Miss Peregrine's Home For Peculiar Children," written by Ransom Riggs.

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: While the holiday season represents the most magical time of year, ancient European folklore warns of Krampus, a horned beast who punishes naughty children at Christmastime. When dysfunctional family squabbling causes young Max (Emjay Anthony) to lose his festive spirit, it unleashes the wrath of the fearsome demon. As Krampus lays siege to the Engel home, mom (Toni Collette), pop (Adam Scott), sister (Stefania LaVie Owen) and brother must band together to save one another from a monstrous fate.

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: While the holiday season represents the most magical time of year, ancient European folklore warns of Krampus, a horned beast who punishes naughty children at Christmastime. When dysfunctional family squabbling causes young Max (Emjay Anthony) to lose his festive spirit, it unleashes the wrath of the fearsome demon. As Krampus lays siege to the Engel home, mom (Toni Collette), pop (Adam Scott), sister (Stefania LaVie Owen) and brother must band together to save one another from a monstrous fate.

programme.title: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
programme.desc: When his beloved grandfather leaves Jake clues to a mystery that spans different worlds and times, he finds a magical place known as Miss Peregrine's School for Peculiar Children. But the mystery and danger deepen as he gets to know the residents and learns about their special powers - and their terrifying enemies. Ultimately, Jake discovers that only his own special peculiarity can save his new friends. Based on the novel "Miss Peregrine's Home For Peculiar Children," written by Ransom Riggs.

programme.title: Fun With Dick and Jane
programme.desc: After Dick Harper (Jim Carrey) loses his job at Globodyne in an Enron-esque collapse, he and his wife, Jane (Téa Leoni), turn to crime in order to handle the massive debt they now face. Two intelligent people, Dick and Jane actually get pretty good at robbing people and even enjoy it -- but they have second thoughts when they're reminded that crime can hurt innocent people. When the couple hears that Globodyne boss Jack McCallister (Alec Baldwin) actually swindled the company, they plot revenge.

programme.title: Tomorrowland
programme.desc: Whenever Casey Newton (Britt Robertson) touches a lapel pin with the letter T on it, she finds herself transported to Tomorrowland, a city filled with huge robots and sleek buildings. The gifted young woman recruits the help of scientist Frank Walker (George Clooney), a previous visitor to Tomorrowland, who years ago made a startling discovery about the future. Together, the two adventurers travel to the metropolis to uncover its mysterious secrets.

programme.title: Hours
programme.desc: A new father (Paul Walker) must remain behind and try to keep his prematurely born daughter alive after Hurricane Katrina knocks out the power in their New Orleans hospital.

programme.title: 12 Mighty Orphans
programme.desc: During the Great Depression, Rusty Russell gives up a privileged position to coach football at an orphanage in Fort Worth, Texas. Whipping his young players into shape, they soon become an inspiration to their city, state and an entire nation.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four high school kids discover an old video game console and are drawn into the game's jungle setting, literally becoming the adult avatars they chose. What they discover is that you don't just play Jumanji - you must survive it. To beat the game and return to the real world, they'll have to go on the most dangerous adventure of their lives, discover what Alan Parrish left 20 years ago, and change the way they think about themselves - or they'll be stuck in the game forever.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: When Spencer goes back into the fantastical world of Jumanji, pals Martha, Fridge and Bethany re-enter the game to bring him home. But the game is now broken -- and fighting back. Everything the friends know about Jumanji is about to change, as they soon discover there's more obstacles and more danger to overcome.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Jamie is pulled into intrigue while serving as a groomsman at Helwater; in 1968, Claire, Brianna and Roger struggle to trace Jamie's whereabouts, leaving Clarie to wonder if they will ever find him.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Brianna grapples with life-changing revelations and Claire must help her come to terms with the fact that she is her father's daughter; Roger brings news that forces Claire and Brianna to face an impossible choice.

programme.title: Hightown
programme.desc: Ray is so close to getting everything he's wanted, but he will have to maneuver things just right; Jackie comes to a crossroad and must choose how to move forward.

programme.title: The Misfits
programme.desc: A band of modern-day Robin Hoods recruits a renowned thief to help steal millions in gold bars stashed underneath one of the world's most secure prisons.

programme.title: Power Book II: Ghost
programme.desc: Davis questions Tariq's client referrals; Cane finds Brayden eager to prove himself and gives him the chance to make some real money; Zeke needs everyone's help to assure his professional basketball future is protected.

programme.title: Hightown
programme.desc: Ray is so close to getting everything he's wanted, but he will have to maneuver things just right; Jackie comes to a crossroad and must choose how to move forward.

programme.title: Daylight
programme.desc: A group of armed robbers fleeing the police head for the New Jersey Tunnel and run right into trucks transporting toxic waste. The spectacular explosion that follows results in both ends of the tunnel collapsing and the handful of people who survived the explosion are now in peril. Kit Latura is the only man with the skill and knowledge to lead the band of survivors out of the tunnel before the structure collapses.

programme.title: Hope Floats
programme.desc: Birdee Pruitt (Sandra Bullock) has been humiliated on live television by her best friend, Connie (Rosanna Arquette), who's been sleeping with Birdee's husband, Bill (Michael Paré). Birdee tries starting over with her daughter, Bernice (Mae Whitman), by returning to her small Texas hometown, but she's faced with petty old acquaintances who are thrilled to see Birdee unhappy -- except for her friend Justin (Harry Connick Jr.). As he helps Birdee get back on her feet, love begins to blossom.

programme.title: 12 Mighty Orphans
programme.desc: During the Great Depression, Rusty Russell gives up a privileged position to coach football at an orphanage in Fort Worth, Texas. Whipping his young players into shape, they soon become an inspiration to their city, state and an entire nation.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Buddy (Will Ferrell) was accidentally transported to the North Pole as a toddler and raised to adulthood among Santa's elves. Unable to shake the feeling that he doesn't fit in, the adult Buddy travels to New York, in full elf uniform, in search of his real father. As it happens, this is Walter Hobbs (James Caan), a cynical businessman. After a DNA test proves this, Walter reluctantly attempts to start a relationship with the childlike Buddy with increasingly chaotic results.

programme.title: Multiplicity
programme.desc: Doug Kinney (Michael Keaton) is a busy construction worker struggling to make time for his family and his demanding job. When a scientist offers to clone him, Doug accepts and spawns a slightly more macho version of himself. He decides to create a second clone, but this sparks a series of duplications when his second clone begins to feel overwhelmed. Doug attempts to manage his many clones while trying to keep his wife (Andie MacDowell) in the dark.

programme.title: The Girl Next Door
programme.desc: Eighteen-year-old Matthew Kidman (Emile Hirsch) is a straight-arrow overachiever who has never really lived life... until he falls for his new neighbor, the beautiful and seemingly innocent Danielle (Elisha Cuthbert). When Matthew discovers this perfect girl next door is a one-time porn star, his sheltered existence begins to spin out of control. Ultimately, Danielle helps Matthew emerge from his shell and discover that sometimes you have to risk everything for the person you love.

programme.title: Hightown
programme.desc: Ray is so close to getting everything he's wanted, but he will have to maneuver things just right; Jackie comes to a crossroad and must choose how to move forward.

programme.title: Power Book II: Ghost
programme.desc: Davis questions Tariq's client referrals; Cane finds Brayden eager to prove himself and gives him the chance to make some real money; Zeke needs everyone's help to assure his professional basketball future is protected.

programme.title: Down to Earth
programme.desc: When amateur comedian Lance Barton (Chris Rock) finds himself at Heaven's door, he is convinced there has been a mistake. Miraculously he is right. Since returning to his own body is not an option, a heavenly agent places him into the corpse of a rich Manhattan mogul who has just been murdered by his wife -- until a more suitable replacement can be found. Ironically, it is as this new person that Lance ultimately discovers his true self, falls in love and improves his comedy act in the process.

programme.title: Elf

programme.title: The Craft: Legacy
programme.desc: An eclectic foursome of aspiring teenage witches get more than they bargained for as they lean into their newfound powers.

programme.desc: Ray is so close to getting everything he's wanted, but he will have to maneuver things just right; Jackie comes to a crossroad and must choose how to move forward.

programme.title: Power Book II: Ghost
programme.desc: Davis questions Tariq's client referrals; Cane finds Brayden eager to prove himself and gives him the chance to make some real money; Zeke needs everyone's help to assure his professional basketball future is protected.

programme.title: Dawn of the Dead
programme.desc: When her husband is attacked by a zombified neighbor, Ana (Sarah Polley) manages to escape, only to realize her entire Milwaukee neighborhood has been overrun by the walking dead. After being questioned by cautious policeman Kenneth (Ving Rhames), Ana joins him and a small group that gravitates to the local shopping mall as a bastion of safety. Once they convince suspicious security guards that they are not contaminated, the group bands together to fight the undead hordes.

programme.title: Fantasy Island
programme.desc: The enigmatic Mr. Roarke makes the secret dreams of his guests come true at a luxurious tropical resort. But when the fantasies turn into nightmares, the visitors must soon solve the island's mystery in order to escape with their lives.

programme.desc: Ray is so close to getting everything he's wanted, but he will have to maneuver things just right; Jackie comes to a crossroad and must choose how to move forward.

programme.title: The Craft: Legacy
programme.desc: An eclectic foursome of aspiring teenage witches get more than they bargained for as they lean into their newfound powers.

programme.title: Stomp the Yard
programme.desc: After his brother's death, a troubled but gifted street dancer enrolls in Atlanta's Truth University. As he tries to concentrate on his studies and woo a pretty classmate, he finds himself in the middle of a tug-of-war between fraternities, who want to utilize his talents in an upcoming dance competition.

programme.title: Fantasy Island
programme.desc: The enigmatic Mr. Roarke makes the secret dreams of his guests come true at a luxurious tropical resort. But when the fantasies turn into nightmares, the visitors must soon solve the island's mystery in order to escape with their lives.
